backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing purposes of various frontend files across routing, theming, pages, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus extensive OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with routes including SignUp and wraps the app with theme and Design B providers.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialStore.ts: LocalStorage-based demo credential system supporting account creation, uniqueness checks, and password verification.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialTypes.ts: Type definitions for demo accounts and results returned by credential creation and verification.
frontend/src/auth/session.ts: LocalStorage-backed session manager supporting otp, password, and guest session types.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: Deterministic command interpreter parsing navigation, help, greetings, and fallback responses.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: UI panel for voice/text assistant interactions handling speech recognition, TTS, messaging, and status display.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: LocalStorage utilities for loading, saving, and clearing assistant transcripts.
Type definitions for assistant messages, status, state, and command results.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: UI widget managing assistant panel state, message handling, storage sync, and navigation commands.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useSpe: Custom hook wrapping browser speech recognition with transcript, error, and control state.
Custom hook enabling speech synthesis with toggling, speaking, and canceling features.
frontend/src/designB/components/Dashboar: Header component displaying a section title, optional caption, and action element.
Configurable dashboard tile with icon, label, value, caption, interactive states, and styling variants.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBS: Wrapper surface component applying background, border, or shadow variants.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBT: Typography components for page titles, section titles, captions, and body text.
frontend/src/designB/components/ThemeSwi: Toggle switch to change between default and Design B themes.
frontend/src/designB/data/placeholders.t: Provides a mock user profile generated with a fixed seed.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBAppSh: Main layout shell with header, footer, bottom navigation, and assistant widget integration.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBBotto: Bottom navigation bar for switching between Home and Profile routes.
frontend/src/designB/storage/themePrefer: Handles saving and loading the user's theme selection from localStorage.
frontend/src/designB/theme.ts: Defines the Design B theme and provides functions to apply or remove it via a DOM attribute.
frontend/src/designB/themeContext.tsx: Provides a React context for managing and persisting theme selection, exposing current theme and setter.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating it when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthSession.ts: Wraps local auth session helpers for OTP, password, and guest sign‑ins with simple callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDemoOtp.ts: Implements a demo OTP generator and verifier with expiry, resend cooldown, and session tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Example React Query hook that waits for an actor before running backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequireAuth.ts: Route guard that redirects to /signin if neither Internet Identity nor a local session is present.
frontend/src/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS setup with light/dark variables and Design B theme overrides using data attributes.
frontend/src/lib/flaker.ts: Seeded fake‑data generator producing deterministic user profiles including names, contact info, and medical details.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind‑merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that initializes React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/HomeDashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing today's health metrics, quick logging actions, and sections for ML prediction categories with auth protection.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Profile page displaying user info, contact details, and a sign‑out flow using Internet Identity and local sessions.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Sign‑in page implementing phone-based OTP, password login, and Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/SignUp.tsx: Sign‑up page that collects user details, creates a demo account, and signs in the user on success.
frontend/src/pages/Welcome.tsx: Landing page with branding, hero content, feature highlights, and navigation to sign‑in or guest mode.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Contains project state metadata, including scope updates, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of defined UI features and requirements for the mobile health care app. It outlines design goals, removed flows, and versioned feature entries.
